comments.body: I think we should make it clear that this file corresponds to the first database schema that we can reasonably expect users to be running and that this resource exists to test that the oldest database schema can be brought up-to-date.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# Snapshot of MLflow DB models as of the 0.9.1 release, prior to the first database migration.
# This file corresponds to the first database schema that we can reasonably expect users to be
# running and exists to test that the oldest database schema can be brought up-to-date.
